title: Laws for internal binary operations
content: In this subsection, the "laws" applicable for "binary operations" according to the definition in [Hall] p. 1 and [BourbakiAlg1] p. 1, p. 4 and p. 7 are defined. These laws are called "internal laws" in [BourbakiAlg1] p. xxi.

blocks.name: ccllaw
blocks.content: Extend class notation for the closure law.

blocks.name: casslaw
blocks.content: Extend class notation for the associative law.

blocks.name: ccomlaw
blocks.content: Extend class notation for the commutative law.

blocks.name: df-cllaw
blocks.content: The closure law for binary operations, see definitions of laws A0. and M0. in section 1.1 of [Hall] p. 1, or definition 1 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 1: the value of a binary operation applied to two operands of a given sets is an element of this set. By this definition, the closure law is expressed as binary relation: a binary operation is related to a set by ` clLaw ` if the closure law holds for this binary operation regarding this set. Note that the binary operation needs not to be a function. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cllaw(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccllaw, copab(s0, s1, wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-comlaw
blocks.content: The commutative law for binary operations, see definitions of laws A2. and M2. in section 1.1 of [Hall] p. 1, or definition 8 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 7: the value of a binary operation applied to two operands equals the value of a binary operation applied to the two operands in reversed order. By this definition, the commutative law is expressed as binary relation: a binary operation is related to a set by ` comLaw ` if the commutative law holds for this binary operation regarding this set. Note that the binary operation needs neither to be closed nor to be a function. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-comlaw(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccomlaw, copab(s0, s1, wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3)), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-asslaw
blocks.content: The associative law for binary operations, see definitions of laws A1. and M1. in section 1.1 of [Hall] p. 1, or definition 5 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 4: the value of a binary operation applied the value of the binary operation applied to two operands and a third operand equals the value of the binary operation applied to the first operand and the value of the binary operation applied to the second and third operand. By this definition, the associative law is expressed as binary relation: a binary operation is related to a set by ` assLaw ` if the associative law holds for this binary operation regarding this set. Note that the binary operation needs neither to be closed nor to be a function. (Contributed by FL, 1-Nov-2009.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-asslaw(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(casslaw, copab(s0, s1, wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s0), cv(s4)), co(cv(s2), cv(s0), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-asslaw(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ assLaw = { < s0, s1 > | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1,((s2[s0]s3)[s0]s4)=(s2[s0](s3[s0]s4)))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: iscllaw
blocks.content: The predicate "is a closed operation". (Contributed by AV, 13-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscllaw(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, ccllaw, c2), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ccllaw, wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c2))), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wcel(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1)))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wcel(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1))), wral(s1, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c2)))
  raleqbidv(s1, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c2))
  eleq12d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  df-cllaw(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c2))))
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c2))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscllaw(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0[clLaw]c2 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)‚àà c2))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ccllaw, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)‚àà c2)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,(s0[hs0]s1)‚àà hs1)))
  raleqbidv(s0, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,(s0[hs0]s1)‚àà hs1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)‚àà c2))
  raleqbidv(s1, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), (s0[hs0]s1)‚àà hs1, (s0[c0]s1)‚àà c2)
  eleq12d((s0[hs0]s1), hs1, (s0[c0]s1), c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, (s0[hs0]s1)=(s0[c0]s1))
  oveq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  df-cllaw(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)‚àà c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)‚àà c2)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: iscomlaw
blocks.content: The predicate "is a commutative operation". (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscomlaw(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, ccomlaw, c2), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ccomlaw, wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-comlaw(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscomlaw(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0[comLaw]c2 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ccomlaw, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))))
  raleqbidv(s0, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0)))
  raleqbidv(s1, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), (s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0), (s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, ((s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)‚Üî(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0)))
  eqeq12d((s0[hs0]s1), (s1[hs0]s0), (s0[c0]s1), (s1[c0]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s1, s0)
  df-comlaw(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0))))
  diff.hs1.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2,(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: clcllaw
blocks.content: Closure of a closed operation. (Contributed by FL, 14-Sep-2010.) (Revised by AV, 21-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm clcllaw(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wbr(c0, ccllaw, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(co(c2, c0, c3), c1))
} = {
  3impib(wbr(c0, ccllaw, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, c3), c1))
  mpcom(wbr(c0, ccllaw, c1), wi(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(co(c2, c0, c3), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  bropaex12(hs2, hs3, c0, ccllaw, c1, wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wral(hs1, cv(hs3), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)))))
  df-cllaw(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1)
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wbr(c0, ccllaw, c1), wi(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(co(c2, c0, c3), c1)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), c1))))
  iscllaw(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, universe)
  expcom(wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), c1))), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(co(c2, c0, c3), c1))
  ovrspc2v(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, c3, c1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clcllaw(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[clLaw]c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c2[c0]c3)‚àà c1)
} = {
  3impib(c0[clLaw]c1, c2 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c1, (c2[c0]c3)‚àà c1)
  mpcom(c0[clLaw]c1, ((c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c2[c0]c3)‚àà c1), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  bropaex12(hs2, hs3, c0, ccllaw, c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà hs3, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà hs3,(hs0[hs2]hs1)‚àà hs3)))
  df-cllaw(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1)
  syl6bi((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), c0[clLaw]c1, ((c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c2[c0]c3)‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)‚àà c1)))
  iscllaw(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, universe)
  expcom(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,(hs0[c0]hs1)‚àà c1)), (c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c1), (c2[c0]c3)‚àà c1)
  ovrspc2v(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, c3, c1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: isasslaw
blocks.content: The predicate "is an associative operation". (Contributed by FL, 1-Nov-2009.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm isasslaw(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, casslaw, c2), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, casslaw, wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wral(s2, cv(hs1), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wral(s2, cv(hs1), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))), wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wral(s2, cv(hs1), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))), wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))
  raleqbidv(s2, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))
  eqeq12d(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq123d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  eqidd(cv(s2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq123d(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqidd(cv(s0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  df-asslaw(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c2, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isasslaw(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0[assLaw]c2 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, casslaw, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))))
  raleqbidv(s1, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))
  raleqbidv(s2, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), ((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)), ((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, (((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))‚Üî((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))
  eqeq12d(((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2), (s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)), ((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2), (s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)), hs0 = c0)
  oveq123d((s0[hs0]s1), hs0, s2, (s0[c0]s1), c0, s2, hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  eqidd(s2, hs0 = c0)
  oveq123d(s0, hs0, (s1[hs0]s2), s0, c0, (s1[c0]s2), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  eqidd(s0, hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s1, s2)
  df-asslaw(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))))
  diff.hs1.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c2,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: asslawass
blocks.content: Associativity of an associative operation. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (Revised by AV, 21-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm asslawass(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, casslaw, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  ibi(wbr(c0, casslaw, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  syl(wbr(c0, casslaw, c1), wb(wbr(c0, casslaw, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c0, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c0, co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  bropaex12(hs0, hs1, c0, casslaw, c1, wral(s0, cv(hs1), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wral(s2, cv(hs1), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s2))))))))
  df-asslaw(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2)
  isasslaw(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c1, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm asslawass(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[assLaw]c1 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  ibi(c0[assLaw]c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2))))))
  syl(c0[assLaw]c1, (c0[assLaw]c1 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c0]s1)[c0]s2)=(s0[c0](s1[c0]s2)))))), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  bropaex12(hs0, hs1, c0, casslaw, c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))))))
  df-asslaw(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2)
  isasslaw(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c1, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: mgmplusgiopALT
blocks.content: Slot 2 (group operation) of a magma as extensible structure is a closed operation on the base set. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jan-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgmplusgiopALT(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmgm), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), ccllaw, cfv(cbs, c0)))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cmgm), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), ccllaw, cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  mgmcl(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  mp1i(wcel(c0, cmgm), wb(wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), ccllaw, cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0))))), wa(wcel(cfv(cplusg, c0), universe), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(cfv(cplusg, c0), universe), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe))
  fvex(cplusg, c0)
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  iscllaw(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c0), universe, cfv(cbs, c0), universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cmgm))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cmgm))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgmplusgiopALT(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Mgm ‚Üí(+ ` c0)[clLaw](Base ` c0))
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ‚àà Mgm, (+ ` c0)[clLaw](Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)‚àà(Base ` c0))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), c0 ‚àà Mgm, (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)‚àà(Base ` c0))
  3expb(c0 ‚àà Mgm, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)‚àà(Base ` c0))
  mgmcl(c0, hs0, (Base ` c0), hs1, (+ ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  mp1i(c0 ‚àà Mgm, ((+ ` c0)[clLaw](Base ` c0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0),(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)‚àà(Base ` c0)))), ((+ ` c0)‚àà ùïå ‚àß(Base ` c0)‚àà ùïå))
  pm3.2i((+ ` c0)‚àà ùïå, (Base ` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(cplusg, c0)
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  iscllaw(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c0), universe, (Base ` c0), universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà Mgm)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà Mgm)
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: sgrpplusgaopALT
blocks.content: Slot 2 (group operation) of a semigroup as extensible structure is an associative operation on the base set. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jan-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm sgrpplusgaopALT(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, csgrp), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), casslaw, cfv(cbs, c0)))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, csgrp), wbr(cfv(cplusg, c0), casslaw, cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)))))))), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2))))))))
